State.definition: a politically organized body of people usually occupying a definite territory ;esp

1 a.definition: a politically organized body of people usually occupying a definite territoryone that is sovereign

sub_terms.b: the political organization that has supreme civil authority and political power and serves as the basis of government see alsoat,
sub_terms.c: a government or politically organized society having a particular character [a police ]

2.definition: the operations or concerns of the government of a countrythe sphere of administration and supreme political power of a country (as in international relations) [secrets of ] [affairs of ]

3 a.definition: one of the constituent units of a nation having a federal governmentone of the fifty such units comprising the great part of the U.S. see also
